column1: The Pit Room////I really enjoyed the food here at the Pit Room
column2: I thought they did a good job with the brisket
column3: the pulled pork and the pork ribs. By the time we got here at 530pm on a Sunday they already ran out of beef ribs and beef sausage (and ice cream sandwiches)
column4: but that's the risk you run at any good bbq joint
